repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.7
WORKDIR /usr/src
ENV PYCHAT_CONFIG docker
RUN set -x &&\
apk update && \
 apk add --no-cache python3 python3-dev mariadb-dev build-base linux-headers pcre-dev sassc bash curl && \
 pip3 install --no-cache-dir mysqlclient && \
 pip3 install --no-cache-dir uwsgi && \
apk del python3-dev mariadb-dev build-base linux-headers && \
 apk add --no-cache mariadb-client-libs && \
ln -s `which python3` "$(dirname `which python3`)/python"
COPY ./requirements.txt .
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY ./manage.py ./config.json ./DefaultSmilies.cfpack ./docker/chat-uwsgi.ini ./download_content.sh ./
COPY ./chat ./chat/
COPY ./templates  ./templates
RUN bash download_content.sh all
